item.description:
Cynthia is opening up her home for a night of Backgammon this Saturday from 6:00-9:00. If you are an old pro or you've always wanted to learn, this is the perfect opportunity for you to play and be social.

Should you own a Backgammon board, please bring it with you. Also, Cynthia will provide soda, water, tea and martinis. There will be the opportunity for a barbecue though, so any meat (or non-meat product) that you would like to eat, please bring it. Other dishes are also welcome.

Parking is a bit tough; the best place to park is on Peabody street in the parking lot.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Backgammon Night
